      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="en">Neutralisation of sodium hydroxide by phenol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Neutralisation des Natriumhydroxids durch Phenol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Neutralisation d'hydroxyde de sodium par le 
phénol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neutralização do hydroxide do sodium pelo 
phenol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Neutralizzazione dell'idrossido del sodio dal 
fenolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ουδετεροποίηση του υδροξειδίου νατρίου από τη φαινόλη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Neutralización del hidróxido del sodio por el 
fenol</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the equation for the neutralisation of sodium hydroxide using phenol forming an ionic compound, sodium phenoxide.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ionic compound</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">neutralisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">phenol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reaction equation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sodium hydroxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sodium phenoxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">strong base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weak acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Gleichung für die 
Neutralisation des Natriumhydroxids mit dem Phenol, das ein 
Ionenmittel, Natriumphenoxide bildet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'équation pour la 
neutralisation de l'hydroxyde de sodium en utilisant le phénol 
formant un composé ionique, phenoxide de sodium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a equação para a 
neutralização do hydroxide do sodium usando o phenol que dá forma a
um composto ionic, phenoxide do sodium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra l'equazione per la 
neutralizzazione dell'idrossido del sodio usando il fenolo che forma 
un residuo ionico, phenoxide del sodio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την εξίσωση για την 
ουδετεροποίηση του υδροξειδίου νατρίου χρησιμοποιώντας τη φαινόλη
σχηματίζοντας μια ιοντική ένωση, phenoxide νατρίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la ecuación para la 
neutralización del hidróxido del sodio usando el fenol que forma un 
compuesto iónico, phenoxide del sodio.</string>
          </description>
